full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-000330-AJN Document 276 Filed 05/11/21 Page 4 of 4
LAW OFFICES OF BOBBI C. STERNHEIM
Because the government has not requested leave to re-litigate the pretrial schedule this Court previously ordered, we ask that the portion of the government's letter be stricken.
Alternatively, we seek 48 hours to file a response.
Very truly yours,
Bobbi C. Sternheim
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM
cc: Counsel for all parties
